Instant - Time instant
====================================================================================

.. topic:: Label

    Time instant

.. topic:: SKOS Definition

    Una entidad temporal con una extensión o duración cero.

    A temporal entity with zero extent or duration

.. topic:: Imported From

    http://www.w3.org/2006/time#2016
